definition: prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat

sentences.english: He was nevertheless ordained as bishop of Avila amid growing controversy.
sentences.chinese: 不过，他作为主教祝圣的阿维拉由于越来越多的争议。

sentences.english: A story I like is that of St.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢的一个故事是阿维拉的圣特蕾莎的故事。

sentences.english: A story I like is that of St. Theresa of Avila.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢的一个故事是阿维拉的圣特蕾莎的故事。

sentences.english: Avila survived after two bullets were removed from his legs.
sentences.chinese: 阿维拉后存活了两发子弹从他的双腿删除。

sentences.english: It was this cry for help that saved Avila's life.
sentences.chinese: 正是这种对呼救声救了阿维拉的生活。

definition: Santo Domingo, capital of the Dominican Republic
Santiago, capital of Chile/San Diego, California
Ravenna on the Adriatic coast of Italy
